workflow.name: Generate cold outreach drafts from Google Sheets with GPT-4o-mini & Gmail
workflow.description:
**How It Works**
1. Starts with a Manual Trigger

2. Reads lead list from Google Sheet

3. Filter rows where email wasn‚Äôt sent

4. Generate personalized email body (AI)

5. Generate email subject line (AI)

6. Merge AI outputs with original row data

7. Create Gmail draft

8. Update Google Sheet with email content and date

9. Wait 3 seconds between updates to avoid API limits

**Setup Steps**
- Connect Google Sheets, Gmail, and OpenAI credentials
- Check sheet column names (business_name, email, contact_name, city, business_type, email_sent)
- Run Manual Trigger to test one row
- Adjust AI prompts if needed

**Customization**
- Add unique ID column to match rows if needed
- Change AI prompts to adjust email style
- Increase wait time to avoid rate limits

**Use Cases**
- Draft cold emails for review before sending
- Automate lead outreach while keeping human oversight
- Generate personalized emails and subject lines quickly

**Troubleshooting Tips**
- Draft not created ‚Üí check Gmail credentials and scopes
- Sheet not updating ‚Üí check matching column exists
- AI outputs empty ‚Üí increase tokens or check response path

parameters.content:
## How It Works
1. Starts with a Manual Trigger

2. Reads lead list from Google Sheet

3. Filter rows where email wasn‚Äôt sent

4. Generate personalized email body (AI)

5. Generate email subject line (AI)

6. Merge AI outputs with original row data

7. Create Gmail draft

8. Update Google Sheet with email content and date

9. Wait 3 seconds between updates to avoid API limits

## Setup Steps
- Connect Google Sheets, Gmail, and OpenAI credentials
- Check sheet column names (business_name, email, contact_name, city, business_type, email_sent)
- Run Manual Trigger to test one row
- Adjust AI prompts if needed

## Customization
- Add unique ID column to match rows if needed
- Change AI prompts to adjust email style
- Increase wait time to avoid rate limits

## Use Cases
- Draft cold emails for review before sending
- Automate lead outreach while keeping human oversight
- Generate personalized emails and subject lines quickly

## Troubleshooting Tips
- Draft not created ‚Üí check Gmail credentials and scopes
- Sheet not updating ‚Üí check matching column exists
- AI outputs empty ‚Üí increase tokens or check response path

## Phase 1:
Manually trigger the worklfow, read business data from a google sheet and filter the emails which have not already been sent
# ->

## Phase 2:
Create email subject and body using an http request to OpenAI's ChatGPT 4o-mini
# ->

## Phase 3
Prepare fields and create the draft email
# ->

## Phase 4
Prepare the fields (Set) and update google sheet.
(Wait node is for API usage limit management)

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
